vrpayment-settings.messageNotBlank: This value should not be blank.

button.description: Click this button to set VRPayment as default payment handler in the selected SalesChannel
button.label: Set VRPayment as default payment handler

salesChannelCard.messageDefaultPaymentError: VRPayment as default payment could not be set.
salesChannelCard.messageDefaultPaymentUpdated: VRPayment as default payment has been set.

applicationKey.label: Application Key
applicationKey.tooltipText: The Application Key is used to authenticate this plugin with the VRPayment API.

spaceId.label: Space ID
spaceId.tooltipText: The space ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the VRPayment API.

userId.label: User ID
userId.tooltipText: The user ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the VRPayment API.

button.description: Click this button to test the VRPayment API
button.label: API connection test

alert.title: API Test
alert.errorMessage: The connection was failed. Try it again.

settingForm.messageOrderDeliveryStateError: VRPayment OrderDeliveryState could not be saved.
settingForm.messagePaymentMethodConfigurationError: VRPayment PaymentMethodConfiguration could not be saved. Please check your credentials.
settingForm.messageWebHookError: VRPayment WebHook could not be saved. Please check your credentials.

emailEnabled.label: Send order confirmation email
emailEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled your customers will receive an email from your store when their order payment is authorised

lineItemConsistencyEnabled.label: Line item consistency
lineItemConsistencyEnabled.tooltipText: If this option is enabled line item totals in VRPaymentPayment will always match Shopware order total

invoiceDownloadEnabled.label: Invoice Download
invoiceDownloadEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled your customers will be able to download order invoices from VRPayment

webhooksUpdateEnabled.label: Webhooks Update
webhooksUpdateEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled webhook update will be triggered when you save settings

paymentsUpdateEnabled.label: Payments Update
paymentsUpdateEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled payment methods update will be triggered when you save settings
